meanings.sent1: The premanufactured parts were ready for assembly.
meanings.sent2: The premanufactured house was built in a factory.
meanings.sent3: The premanufactured furniture saved a lot of time during the move.
meanings.sent4: Her premanufactured speech sounded rehearsed and insincere.
meanings.sent5: The premanufactured cookies tasted stale and artificial.

meanings.definition: Made before being ordered or sold
meanings.sent1: The premanufactured car was waiting at the dealership.
meanings.sent2: The premanufactured toys were packaged and ready for shipping.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his premanufactured excuses were always at the ready.
meanings.sent4: The premanufactured solutions to the problem were ineffective.
meanings.sent5: The premanufactured garments lacked the personal touch of handmade items.
